overview: Wolf Burkhardt, who has acquired mining rights in Africa, returns home to get financing for his project.  At the same time, he'd like to renew his youthful love for Georgia, but is eventually, and falsely, suspected of fraudulent activities and returns back to Africa.  It is only with the passing of five years that he sees his beloved once more.  In the interim, she has married a state's prosecutor and they have a daughter.
title: Der dunkle Tag
